name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Engineering Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing robust applications, demonstrating strong proficiency in **Python** and **statistical software** including **R**, **SPSS**, and **Stata**. Adept at conducting research project development and literature analysis with an emphasis on compliance with citation standards such as **APA**, **Vancouver**, **Chicago**, and **Harvard**. Proven track record in guiding academic initiatives and delivering high-quality work with flexibility, autonomy, and self-management.

Additionally, I have a solid foundation in building AI/ML-driven platforms, deploying cloud solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD practices. My hands-on experience with technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** allows me to deliver end-to-end solutions that fully meet project requirements, particularly in regulated industries such as healthcare and finance.
